00001 !==============================================================================!
00002 ! MODULE: physics
00003 !
00008 
00009 module physics
00010 
00011   implicit none
00012   private
00013   public :: sample_source,perform_physics,get_eidx
00014 
00015 contains

00017 !===============================================================================
00018 ! SAMPLE_SOURCE
00021 
00022   subroutine sample_source()
00023 
00024     use global, only: mat,neut
00025 
00026     ! local variables
00027     integer :: idx ! index for sampling
00028     real(8) :: rn  ! sampled random number
00029 
00030     ! sample a random number
00031     rn = rand(0)
00032 
00033     ! compute index in cdf
00034     idx = ceiling(rn / mat(1)%source%cdf_width) + 1
00035 
00036     ! bounds checker
00037     if (idx > size(mat(1)%source%E)) then
00038       write(*,*) 'Bounds error on source samplings'
00039       write(*,*) 'Random number:',rn
00040       write(*,*) 'Index Location:',idx
00041       stop
00042     end if
00043 
00044     ! extract that E and set it to neutron
00045     neut%E = mat(1)%source%E(idx)
00046 
00047   end subroutine sample_source
00048 
00049 !===============================================================================
00050 ! PERFORM_PHYSICS
00053 
00054   subroutine perform_physics()
00055 
00056     use global, only: neut,add_to_tallies,n_abs,n_fiss
00057 
00058     ! sample region
00059     neut%region = sample_region()
00060 
00061     ! sample isotope
00062     neut%isoidx = sample_isotope(neut%region)
00063 
00064     ! a collision has now occurred in a region at an energy, add to tally
00065     call add_to_tallies()
00066 
00067     ! sample reaction in isotope
00068     neut%reactid = sample_reaction(neut%region,neut%isoidx)
00069 
00070     ! perform reaction
00071     if (neut%reactid == 1 .or. neut%reactid == 2) then ! absorption
00072       neut%alive = .FALSE.
00073       if (neut%reactid == 1) n_fiss = n_fiss+1
00074       n_abs = n_abs + 1
00075     else if (neut%reactid == 3) then ! scattering
00076       call elastic_scattering(neut%region,neut%isoidx)
00077     else
00078       write(*,*) "Something is wrong after isotope sampling"
00079       stop
00080     end if
00081 
00082   end subroutine perform_physics
00083 
00084 !===============================================================================
00085 ! GET_EIDX
00088 
00089   function get_eidx(E) result(eidx)
00090 
00091     use global, only: mat
00092 
00093     ! formal variables
00094     real(8)             :: E    ! neutron's energy
00095     integer             :: eidx ! the energy index
00096 
00097     ! compute index
00098     eidx = ceiling((log10(E) - log10(mat(1)%E_min))/mat(1)%E_width) + 1
00099 
00100     ! check bounds
00101     if (eidx == 0 .or. eidx >=mat(1)%npts) then
00102       write(*,*) 'Energy index out of bounds!'
00103       write(*,*) 'Energy:',E
00104       write(*,*) 'Width:',mat(1)%E_width
00105       stop
00106    end if
00107 
00108   end function get_eidx
00109 
00110 !===============================================================================
00111 ! SAMPLE_REGION
00114 
00115   function sample_region() result(region)
00116 
00117     use global, only: n_materials,Dancoff,res_iso,radius,mat,eidx,neut
00118 
00119     ! formal variables
00120     integer :: region ! region of interaction
00121 
00122     ! local variables
00123     real(8) :: Pff   ! fuel-to-fuel collision probability
00124     real(8) :: Pfm   ! fuel-to-moderator collision probability
00125     real(8) :: Pmf   ! moderator-to-fuel collision probability
00126     real(8) :: A     ! A factor
00127     real(8) :: a1    ! alpha 1 factor
00128     real(8) :: a2    ! alpha 2 factor
00129     real(8) :: b     ! beta factor
00130     real(8) :: sig_e ! macro escape cross section
00131     real(8) :: sig_t ! macro total cross section of resonant isotope
00132     real(8) :: rn    ! sampled random number
00133 
00134     ! set region number
00135     region = 1
00136 
00137     ! check for more than 1 material
00138     if (n_materials == 2) then
00139 
00140       ! calculate A
00141       A = (1.0_8-Dancoff)/Dancoff
00142 
00143       ! calculate alpha 1
00144       a1 = ((5._8*A+6._8)-sqrt(A**2+36._8*A+36._8))/(2._8*(A+1._8))
00145 
00146       ! calculate alpha 2
00147       a2 = ((5._8*A+6._8)+sqrt(A**2+36._8*A+36._8))/(2._8*(A+1._8))
00148 
00149       ! calculate beta
00150       b = (((4._8*A+6._8)/(A+1._8)) - a1)/(a2 - a1)
00151 
00152       ! calculate macro escape cross section
00153       sig_e = 1._8/(2._8*radius)
00154 
00155       ! get macro total cross section of resonant isotope
00156       sig_t = sum(mat(1)%totalxs(eidx,:))
00157 
00158       ! compute fuel-to-fuel collision probability (Carlviks two-term)
00159       Pff = (b*sig_t)/(a1*sig_e + sig_t) + ((1-b)*sig_t)/(a2*sig_e + sig_t)
00160 
00161       ! compute fuel-to-moderator collision probability
00162       Pfm = 1._8 - Pff
00163 
00164       ! using reciprocity compute moderator-to-fuel collision probability
00165       Pmf = Pfm * (sum(mat(1)%totalxs(eidx,:))*mat(1)%vol) /                   &
00166      &            (sum(mat(2)%totalxs(eidx,:))*mat(2)%vol)
00167 
00168       ! sample random number
00169       rn = rand(0)
00170 
00171       ! figure out what region currently in and sample accordingly
00172       if (neut%region == 1) then
00173         if (rn < Pfm) then
00174           region = 2
00175         else
00176           region = 1
00177         end if
00178       else if (neut%region == 2) then
00179         if (rn < Pmf) then
00180           region = 1
00181         else
00182           region = 2
00183         end if
00184       else
00185         write(*,*) 'Cant find neutron!'
00186         stop
00187       end if
00188 
00189     end if
00190 !print *,'Pff:',Pff,'Pfm:',Pfm,'Pmf:',Pmf,'Energy:',neut%E,sig_t,sum(mat(2)%totalxs(eidx,:)) 
00191 !read*
00192   end function sample_region
00193 
00194 !===============================================================================
00195 ! SAMPLE_ISOTOPE
00198 
00199   function sample_isotope(region) result(isoidx)
00200 
00201     use global, only: mat,eidx
00202 
00203     ! formal variables
00204     integer :: region  ! region of interaction
00205     integer :: isoidx  ! the index of the isotope sampled
00206 
00207     ! local variables
00208     real(8), allocatable :: pmf(:)  ! probability mass function
00209     real(8), allocatable :: cdf(:)  ! cumulative distribution function
00210     real(8)              :: rn      ! sampled random number
00211     integer              :: i       ! iteration counter
00212 
00213     ! allocate pmf and cdf
00214     if(.not. allocated(pmf)) allocate(pmf(mat(region)%nisotopes+1))
00215     if(.not. allocated(cdf)) allocate(cdf(mat(region)%nisotopes+1))
00216 
00217     ! set both to zero
00218     pmf = 0.0_8
00219     cdf = 0.0_8
00220 
00221     ! create pmf at that energy index
00222     pmf(2:size(pmf)) = mat(region)%totalxs(eidx,:) /                           &
00223    &                   sum(mat(region)%totalxs(eidx,:))
00224 
00225     ! create cdf from pmf
00226     do i = 1,size(pmf)
00227       cdf(i) = sum(pmf(1:i))
00228     end do
00229 
00230     ! sample random number
00231     rn = rand(0)
00232 
00233     ! do linear table search on cdf to find which isotope
00234     do i = 1,size(cdf)
00235       if (rn <= cdf(i)) then
00236         isoidx = i - 1
00237         exit
00238       end if
00239     end do
00240 
00241     ! check iso
00242     if (isoidx == 0) then
00243       isoidx = 1 
00244     end if
00245 
00246     ! deallocate pmf and cdf
00247     if (allocated(pmf)) deallocate(pmf)
00248     if (allocated(cdf)) deallocate(cdf)
00249 
00250   end function sample_isotope
00251 
00252 !===============================================================================
00253 ! SAMPLE_REACTION
00256 
00257   function sample_reaction(region,isoidx) result(reactid)
00258 
00259     use global, only: mat,eidx
00260 
00261     ! formal variables
00262     integer :: region   ! region of interaction
00263     integer :: isoidx   ! the sampled isotope index
00264     integer :: reactid  ! the id of the reaction type
00265 
00266     ! local variables
00267     real(8) :: pmf(4)  ! probability mass function
00268     real(8) :: cdf(4)  ! cumulative distribution function
00269     real(8) :: rn      ! sampled random number
00270     integer :: i       ! iteration counter
00271 
00272     ! set up pmf
00273     pmf = (/0.0_8,mat(region)%isotopes(isoidx)%xs_fiss(eidx),                  &
00274    &              mat(region)%isotopes(isoidx)%xs_capt(eidx),                  &
00275                   mat(region)%isotopes(isoidx)%xs_scat(eidx)/)
00276 
00277     ! normalize pmf
00278     pmf = pmf / sum(pmf)
00279 
00280     ! compute cdf
00281     do i = 1,4
00282       cdf(i) = sum(pmf(1:i))
00283     end do
00284 
00285     ! sample random number
00286     rn = rand(0)
00287 
00288     ! perform linear table search
00289     do i = 1,4
00290       if (rn < cdf(i)) then
00291         reactid = i - 1
00292         exit
00293       end if
00294     end do
00295 
00296   end function sample_reaction
00297 
00298 !===============================================================================
00299 ! ELASTIC_SCATTERING
00302 
00303   subroutine elastic_scattering(region,isoidx)
00304 
00305     use global, only: neut,mat,kT
00306 
00307     ! formal variables
00308     integer :: region ! region of interaction
00309     integer :: isoidx ! isotope sampled index
00310 
00311     ! local variables
00312     integer :: i     ! iteration counter
00313     integer :: idx   ! index in cdf vector
00314     integer :: kTidx ! index in kT vector
00315     real(8) :: rn    ! sampled random number
00316     real(8) :: EkT   ! energy / kT
00317     real(8) :: Eint  ! interpolated E value
00318     real(8), allocatable :: Evec(:)
00319 
00320     ! sample random number
00321     rn = rand(0)
00322 
00323     ! check for thermal scattering
00324     if (neut%E < 4e-6_8 .and. mat(region)%isotopes(isoidx)%thermal) then
00325 
00326       ! get index in cdf
00327       idx = ceiling(rn/mat(region)%isotopes(isoidx)%thermal_lib%cdf_width)
00328 
00329       ! check index
00330       if (idx == 0) idx = 1
00331 
00332       ! preallocate energy vector
00333       if (.not.allocated(Evec))                                                &
00334      & allocate(Evec(size(mat(region)%isotopes(isoidx)%thermal_lib%kTvec)))
00335 
00336       ! set possible energy ratios vector
00337       Evec = mat(region)%isotopes(isoidx)%thermal_lib%Erat(idx,:)
00338 
00339       ! get energy in kT units
00340       EkT = neut%E/kT
00341 
00342       ! find index in kT space
00343       do i = 1,size(mat(region)%isotopes(isoidx)%thermal_lib%kTvec)
00344         if (EkT < mat(region)%isotopes(isoidx)%thermal_lib%kTvec(i)) then
00345           kTidx = i
00346           exit
00347         end if
00348       end do 
00349 
00350       ! interpolate on energy value
00351       if (kTidx == 1) then
00352         neut%E = Evec(kTidx)
00353       else
00354         ! perform linear interplation on kT value
00355         Eint = Evec(kTidx-1) + (EkT -                                          &
00356        &mat(region)%isotopes(isoidx)%thermal_lib%kTvec(kTidx-1))*((Evec(kTidx) &
00357        &- Evec(kTidx-1))/(mat(region)%isotopes(isoidx)%thermal_lib%kTvec(kTidx)&
00358        &- mat(region)%isotopes(isoidx)%thermal_lib%kTvec(kTidx-1)))
00359 
00360        ! multiply by incoming energy
00361        neut%E = neut%E*Eint
00362 
00363       end if
00364 
00365       ! deallocate energy vector
00366       if(allocated(Evec)) deallocate(Evec)
00367 
00368     else
00369 
00370       ! perform asymptotic elastic scattering
00371       neut%E = neut%E - neut%E*(1-mat(region)%isotopes(isoidx)%alpha)*rn;
00372 
00373     end if
00374 
00375   end subroutine elastic_scattering
00376 
00377 end module physics
